resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086741</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">PLoS Clinical Trials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS Klinische Versuche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Épreuves Cliniques de PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimentações Clínicas De PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prove Cliniche Di PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS κλινικές δοκιμές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ensayos Clínicos De PLoS</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">PLoS Clinical Trials is an international peer-reviewed, open-access journal that publishes results of randomized trials from all medical and public health disciplines. The journal's aim is to increase the breadth of clinical trials reporting and thus ensure that all trials on human participants are reported in the peer-reviewed literature and accessible to all.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS klinische Versuche ist internationales 
Gleich-wiederholt, öffnen-Zugriff Journal, das Resultate der 
randomisierten Versuche von allen Disziplinen des medizinischen und 
öffentlichen Gesundheitswesens veröffentlicht. Das Ziel des 
Journals ist, die Breite der klinischen berichtenden Versuche zu 
erhöhen und folglich sicherzugehen, daß alle Versuche auf 
menschlichen Teilnehmern in der Gleich-wiederholten Literatur und 
zugänglich zu allen berichtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les épreuves cliniques de PLoS est pair-passé en
revue international, le journal d'ouvrir-accès qui édite des 
résultats des épreuves randomisées de toutes les disciplines de 
santé médicale et publique. Le but du journal est augmenter la
largeur des épreuves cliniques enregistrant et de s'assurer ainsi que
toutes les épreuves sur les participants humains sont enregistrées 
dans la littérature pair-passée en revue et accessible à tous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As experimentações clínicas de PLoS são 
par-revisto internacional, o jornal do abr-acesso que publica 
resultados de experimentações randomized de todas as disciplinas da 
saúde médica e pública. O alvo do jornal é aumentar a 
largura das experimentações clínicas que relatam e assegurar-se de 
assim que todas as experimentações em participants humanos estejam 
relatadas na literatura par-revista e acessível a tudo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le prove cliniche di PLoS è pari-rivista 
internazionale, giornale di apr-accesso che pubblica i risultati delle
prove ripartite con scelta casuale da tutte le discipline di sanità 
pubblica medica e. Lo scopo del giornale è di aumentare la 
larghezza delle prove cliniche che segnalano ed accertarsi così che 
tutte le prove sui partecipanti umani siano segnalate nella 
letteratura pari-rivista ed accessibile a tutti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS οι κλινικές δοκιμές είναι διεθνής 
όμοιος-αναθεωρημένη, περιοδικό ανοικτός-πρόσβασης που δημοσιεύει
τα αποτελέσματα των τυχαίων δοκιμών από όλες τις πειθαρχίες 
ιατρικής και δημόσιας υγείας. Ο στόχος του περιοδικού 
είναι να αυξηθεί το εύρος της υποβολής έκθεσης κλινικών δοκιμών
και έτσι να εξασφαλιστεί ότι όλες οι δοκιμές στους ανθρώπινους 
συμμετέχοντες αναφέρονται στην όμοιος-αναθεωρημένη λογοτεχνία και
προσιτός σε όλοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los ensayos clínicos de PLoS son par-haber 
repasado internacional, el diario del abrir-acceso que publica 
resultados de ensayos seleccionados al azar de todas las disciplinas 
de la salud médica y pública. La puntería del diario es 
aumentar la anchura de los ensayos clínicos que señalan y asegurarse
así de que todos los ensayos en participantes humanos están 
señalados en la literatura par-repasada y accesible a todos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086741</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103801</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/plos-clinical-trials</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
